title: Enemy
description: An enemy object, as found in ROOMS[*].SCREENS[*].ENEMIES[*]

id.description: The Room-unique Id of this enemy.

x.description: The number of pixels from the left edge of the Screen to the center of this Enemy.

y.description: The number of pixels from the top of the Screen to the center of this Enemy.

rot.description: The number of degrees this enemy is rotated by when it spawns in.

type.description: The enemy type, for example 0 for Zoomer.

lock.description: Whether this enemy MUST spawn every time the player enters the room.

level.description: The difficulty level of this enemy - refers to an object at ENEMY_DATA[type][level].
